item.description: Matrick / [[Matrick Side-Eyes]] Character Sheet Key Abilities Key Equipment Chad / [[Cruceus Hieron Auric Disthenes]] Character Sheet Key Abilities Smites: Does a shit ton of damage Lay on Hands: Healing Key Equipment Azuredge Saf / [[Safvyre Everdreya]] Character Sheet Key Abilities Wild Shape Summon Animals Key Equipment Staff of the Woodlands Qis / [[Qisandoral Ofandrus]] Character Sheet Key Abilities Telekenetic Shove Sculpt Spells: For a spell that affecets other creatures you can see - Qis can choose a number of creatures equal to 1 + spells level, chose creatures automatically succeed on saves and take no damage on a successful save Arcane Recovery Key Equipment Arcane Grimoire Robe of Stars Blinded Stone of Golorr with 1 2 Portent charges Tuf / [[Tuferbop Lilli Timbers]] Character Sheet Key Abilities Stunning Strike Key Equipment Ring of Truth Telling Renear Neverember Character Sheet Key Abilities Sneak Attack: Sneak attack for huge damage Lucky: Can reroll with 3 luck points earned / short rest Reliable Talent: Any d20 roll on an ability check 9 or lower becomes a 10 Key Equipment Closed Lord Robe + Mask (Attuned)
